title: Research progress of functional MXene in inhibiting lithium/zinc metal battery dendrites
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26837-26856
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05220J, Review Article
Open Access

Haiyan Wang, Mengxin Ning, Min Sun, Bin Li, Yachuan Liang, Zijiong Li
The progress of MXene in inhibiting the growth of lithium and zinc anode dendrites is summarized and an overview on the current challenges of MXene is provided.
